Title: En Ami
Plot: The Cigarette-Smoking Man offers to show Scully the cure for all diseases if she travels with him, but on one condition:  Mulder must not know about her trip.
GuestStars: Timothy Landfield, Cory Parravano, Michael Canavan, Jacqueline Schultz, Thomas Roe, Tom Bailey, Michael Shamus Wiles, Louise Latham
